channel.title: Server Hoster Required!
channel.description:
Hi im looking a server hoster if anyone would like to host my server plz pm me with the following details
How many hours can u host my server??
How many other servers are you also hosting atm?? What is your internet connection speed?? Are you a senoir member or a respectful member of this forum!??
Terms/Conditions: I _________ will not edit or steal any information from the owner of Final PkerZ's (Kriptick) server and I am hosting Final PkerZ and will not share any confidential information about Final PkerZ with anyone except Kriptick the official owner of Final PkerZ. I also agree that Kriptick is the official owner of Final PkerZ and he has 90% power over the server and 10% goes to me for hosting the server.
I _________ agree to these terms/conditions.
I will have a copy of this from u and I shall let moparisthebest know if any of these terms are broken! at any time! so this is my proof!
Thnx I g2g so ill read ur pm's when i get back and ill inform u as soon as posible thnx all! :) [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Read the rules, this topic is for the development process of servers and to help other people with their problems in development.[/center]
